QuestData.Title: Report to Zurai
QuestData.Description: With the arrival of Field Commander Romus and his forces, the Alliance and their draenei friends have grown bold. They're militarizing every old draenei ruin from here to Shattrath.$B$BIn response, the trolls have established a new outpost in the eastern part of Zangarmarsh, just south of the Dead Mire. Swamprat Post, they're calling it. I'm glad they have a sense of humor about living in a place like that, because I wouldn't relish it.$B$BThe post's commander has asked me to send anyone I can spare.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Zurai at Swamprat Post in Zangarmarsh.
QuestData.RewardText: To be honest, I had expected more, but you'll have to do. Welcome to Swamprat Post.
